TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract CertificateObject implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.InfoPath.Certificate

Docs.summary: Represents the X.509 digital certificate that has been used to create a signature.

remarks.para: This type is a wrapper for a coclass that is required by managed code for COM interoperability. Use this type to access the members of the COM interface implemented by this coclass. For information about the COM interface, including a link to descriptions of its members, see.
Use the property of the object to return a Certificate object.
